hero.title: Who we are
hero.description: RunGoMX was born in Mexico to transform the way race directors and runners experience running. We are an end-to-end platform that simplifies registrations, payments, timing, results and rankings, all in one place.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.paragraph1: We want Mexico to be a reference in sports innovation in Latin America. That every race, regardless of its size, has access to world-class tools without paying world-class prices.
vision.paragraph2: We believe that technology should serve the sport, not complicate it. That's why we build solutions designed for the Mexican context: simple, accessible and powerful.

whyWeExist.title: Why we exist
whyWeExist.intro: Running in Mexico has grown enormously, but the digital infrastructure has not grown at the same pace. Organizers and runners face recurring problems:
problems: Systems that don't talk to each other

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.subtitle: We create a complete ecosystem for running in Mexico:

forRunners.title: For runners
features: Super simple registrations for any race
Secure payments with any method (card, transfer, cash)
Race recommendations based on your level and location

forOrganizers.title: For race directors
features: Marketing and communication with your runners

whatWeDo.tagline: One platform for the entire lifecycle of your race.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.intro: We are a team of Mexican technologists passionate about running and innovation. We don't copy foreign models; we build from scratch with a local mindset.

values.title: Simplicity
values.description: Technology should be invisible. Let the runner focus on running and the race director on creating experiences.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear prices, no surprises. Open data for everyone. Reliable and auditable code.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We don't launch half-baked features. Each functionality goes through rigorous testing before reaching production.

values.title: Community
values.description: Running is community. We listen to race directors and runners to build what they really need.

values.title: Constant innovation
values.description: The market evolves fast. We evolve faster. Weekly releases, new features every month.

mexicanTechnology.title: We are Mexican technology for Mexican running
mexicanTechnology.subtitle: We are not an adaptation of something that works in the United States or Europe. RunGoMX is born and grows in Mexico, with deep knowledge of the local market.
knowledge: The areas where people run (CDMX, Guadalajara, Monterrey, Puebla, Quer√©taro...)
The payment methods that work (OXXO, transfers, cards, interest-free installments)
The language and culture (clear communication in Mexican Spanish)
Real operational challenges (logistics, weather, altitude, traffic)
mexicanTechnology.tagline: That's why our platform doesn't just work technically: it works for the real context of Mexico.

commitment.title: Our commitment
goals: RunGoMX is not just software. It's a long-term commitment to the running community in Mexico.
We work side by side with race directors to understand their real needs. We listen to runners to improve their experience. We invest in cutting-edge technology to always stay ahead.
We constantly innovate. What is today the most complete platform on the market, tomorrow will be even better.
Because at the end of the day, our success is measured in successful races, happy runners and an increasingly strong running community.
